data.eml:eml: Description of new Dryocoetes (Coleoptera, Curculionidae, Scolytinae) speciesfrom Afghanistan and Northern India and redescription of Scolytoplatypus kunala Strohm

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yu. Mandelshtam, Michail, V. Petrov, Alexander (2010): Description of new Dryocoetes (Coleoptera, Curculionidae, Scolytinae) speciesfrom Afghanistan and Northern India and redescription of Scolytoplatypus kunala Strohm. ZooKeys 56: 179-190, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.56.525, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.56.525
